text: Girl No. 217 () is a 1945 Soviet drama movie directed by Mikhail Romm.В рамках фестиваля "Короткие встречи" в Германии покажут две программы советского киноЧеловек №217 (1944) It stars Yelena Kuzmina, Vladimir Balashov, and Tatyana Barysheva. ==Actors== * Yelena Kuzmina as Tanya Krylova * Vladimir Balashov as Max Krauss * Tatyana Barysheva as Greta Krauss * Heinrich Greif as Kurt Kahger * Anastasiya Lissianskaya as Klava Vasilyeva * Grigory Mikhaylov as Prisoner == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1945 drama movies Category:Soviet drama movies Category:Movies directed by Mikhail Romm
title: Girl No. 217
